subject: Athletics and Sports
Computer and Video Games
lead_paragraph: Professional gaming, which appeared to be a way for video game fanatics to make a living on their Xbox 360 consoles, has taken a big hit and now only one league survives.
snippet: Professional gaming, which appeared to be a way for video game fanatics to make a living on their Xbox 360 consoles, has taken a big hit and now only one league survives.
